head.title: Bbq Lamb Salad W/grilled Vegetables and Goat Cheese (Gc)

ing.item: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
Red bell pepper; grilled and, seeded, cut into 4, pieces
Yellow bell pepper; grilled and, seeded, cut into 4, pieces
New potatoes; cooked, grilled, and cut into, 1/4-inch thick, slices

directions.step:
Prepare a wood or charcoal fire and let it burn down to embers. Brush the lamb with the barbecue sauce and season to taste with salt and pepper. Grill for 3 minutes on each side or until done. Serve on top of mixed greens with grilled vegetables and goat cheese.
Yield: 4 servings
